config.ToolbarArrangement.name: Toolbar Arrangement
config.ToolbarArrangement.description:
Change how toolbars are ordered on screen
Vanilla: Show 1 toolbar only
H 213: horizontal, 2-1-3 order
H 312: horizontal, 3-1-2 order
V 123: vertical, 1-2-3 order (3-2-1 when bar is bottom screen)
config.HideToolbarItemBoxes.name: Hide Toolbar Boxes
config.HideToolbarItemBoxes.description: Hide the boxes behind each item
config.HideToolbarBackground.name: Hide Toolbar Background
